Title: Brother Bear
Writer: Tab Murphy (screenplay), Lorne Cameron (screenplay), David Hoselton (screenplay), Steve Bencich (screenplay), Ron J. Friedman (screenplay), Stephen J. Anderson (story supervisor), Stevie Wermers (story), Kevin Deters (story), Woody Woodman (story), Thom Enriquez (story), Kevin Harkey (story), Broose Johnson (story), John Norton (story), John Puglisi (story), Tim Hodge (additional story), Tom LaBaff (additional story), Ray Shenusay (additional story), Brian Pimental (additional story), Jim Story (additional story), Don Dougherty (additional story), Don Hall (additional story), Samuel Levine (additional story), Aurian Redson (additional story), Chris Williams (additional story), Jeff Hand (additional story material), Sam Levine (additional story)
Actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Jeremy Suarez, Jason Raize, Rick Moranis
Plot: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 21 nominations.
